title: Exploring the integration of LCA elements into early stage bioenergy research
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: We are using lab and pilot scale bioenergy plants to compare the Life Cycle Impact effects of bioenergy production. We are doing this to test the method of LCA's ability to determine environmental impacts predicatively. The work will be of use to the bioenergy and energy industry, as well as the LCA community Energy,Environment
